title: FTP and SMB Weak Credentials Challenge
description: Exploit FTP anonymous login and SMB weak password to uncover flags.
hints: Both services have credentials configured in a way that makes them vulnerable.
Try connecting to the FTP service with anonymous login.
Use common or default passwords for SMB service access.
learningObjectives: Understand the security risks of misconfigured FTP and SMB services.
Learn to exploit FTP services with anonymous access enabled.
Practice exploiting SMB services with weak or default credentials.
